sense.def:
Stvar, oseba ali količina, ki je
extra
, je dodana drugim iste vrste.

seg.quote: Take an extra pair of shoes.
You have to pay extra for breakfast.

sense.def:
Extras
so stvari, ki niso nujno potrebne, vendar nekaj naredijo udobnejše, bolj koristno ali prijetno.

seg.quote: With the extras, the car cost £4,000.

sense.def:
Extras
so tudi dodatni stroški, prišteti k osnovni ceni nečesa.

An extra
je oseba, ki igra nepomembno vlogo v filmu.

To be extra polite
ali
to be extra careful
pomeni biti bolj vljuden ali previden kot ponavadi.

seg.quote: He was extra polite to his superiors.
